title: Junior Cricket Foundation
description: Perfect introduction to cricket for young children. Learn basic techniques including batting, bowling, and fielding through fun games and activities.
short_description: Basic cricket skills for beginners ages 6-10

title: Advanced Batting Masterclass
description: Intensive batting coaching focusing on technique, shot selection, and match strategy. Suitable for players with some experience who want to improve their batting skills.
short_description: Advanced batting techniques for experienced players

title: Fast Bowling Academy
description: Specialized coaching for fast bowlers. Learn proper run-up, action, and various bowling techniques including swing and seam bowling.

title: Wicket Keeping Excellence
description: Comprehensive wicket keeping program covering stance, glove work, collecting, and stumping techniques.

title: All-Rounder Development
description: Complete cricket program for developing all-round skills including batting, bowling, fielding, and match awareness.
